content: this legal text summarizes the division of assets between two individuals referred to as bd and bs the assets include a garage an apartment on the ground floor and an apartment on the first floor with an attic and terrace the parties have agreed to terminate their coownership and divide the assets into two shares the first share includes the apartment on the first floor while the second share includes the apartment on the ground floor the value of each share is specified the parties also guarantee the ownership and availability of the assigned properties and agree to waive potential legal mortgages the expenses of the division will be shared equally by the parties
